displayName.text: Atmosphere Academy Public Charter Schools - 6th & 7th Grade Campus

formattedAddress: 22 Marble Hill Ave, Bronx, NY 10463, USA
adrFormatAddress: 22 Marble Hill Ave, Bronx, NY 10463, USA

originalText.text: Christian Roman is nothing but a bully! He tries to back parents up against the wall and loves the fact that parents have lost their jobs because of last minute meetings he forces on families. Christian Roman does not know how to appropriately engage families as all he does is yell. Kimberly Liriano loves to target students and spreads lies about students characteristics among staff members. She deliberately lies about children she does not like and stirs up strife between students and parents. Colin Greene is extremely passive aggressive and does not care about the students that attend his school. Colin Greene views students as nothing but dollar signs. The staff mentioned above as well as the majority of the staff in this school are not equipped to handle children and the school environment including family engagement. My child had a more enriching experience in the school I transferred him to oppose to Atmosphere Academy. I only wish I transferred my child out of this school earlier to save him and myself from the sheer nonsense, targeting, harassment and bullying we experienced from the staff. The staff will target children they do not like and the staff hate when parents know their rights. Leadership continuously threaten children and parents. The leadership diagnose and negatively label students when they do not have the licensure, educational background or skills to do so.Parents be aware. If I could give a 0 rating, I would.

originalText.text: I am the parent of an Atmosphere student.  Atmosphere is a great school that stresses the importance of education and social responsibility.  The staff members show the utmost care and dedication to the students and their families.  The administration is responsive to the ideas and feedback shared by the parents and the students.  The building is very safe and the students are respectful.  The school places great emphasis on respect, citizenship, social justice, and academic achievement.  Students receive rewards and recognition for their own positive behaviors and academic accomplishments. The school promotes core values.  There is a lot of homework, and the days are long, so the students work hard.  There is much opportunity for individual teacher attention.  This is a wonderful school in District 10 in the Bronx that promotes academic achievement, sets high academic standards, and works hard with the school community to close achievement gaps in our community.  The school continues to improve and in its few years of existence has already had a wonderful impact on many middle school students.  At Atmosphere, as parent involvement grows, as parents' investment in education continues to increase, and as the strong and caring school leadership continues, the school will only continue to expand and improve for our young scholars.

originalText.text: For me as a parent it has been a great experience having my daughter in this charter school. It has been a great experience overall with the magnificent teacher, staff and committee they have. I would recommend and have recommended this school to family and friends. The cirruculm, the activities and the professionalism they have is way beyond expectations. I still cannot forget they day I received the acceptance letter that she had won the lottery raffle. My daughter has improved in her education and as a young lady has more importance in values.  Best school ever.

originalText.text: Excellent. I am very glad been part of this great school. Teachers, Staff and the Principal are very welcome and accessible to everyone to address any concerns I have had anytime any day and always come out with a reasonable and supportive solution.This thought is shared with many parents I have meet throughout almost 2 years in this school.This is like any other (extra help every day, after school program, rewards and recognitions for doing the right thing and good academic performance, online instant access to report card and homework, updates by email on everything, summer camp free and multiple trips).this is only a few services and support I can tell. Thanks for your outstanding service and commitment with the education.

originalText.text: At the beggining I was ambivalent about the school, but after reading the reviews from parents complaining about how tough they are in discipline and academics I knew it was the right place for my son. My son loves the school and the teachers; SSA Collado and Ms. Solores are the face of Atmosphere to me; they are the first people I talk to for any information I may need. I feel at peace knolwing we made the right choice and our son is a Atmosphere Academy scholar.
